mapper.select: select * from (select c.*, rownum rn from (select a.no, a.title, to_char(a.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate, to_char(a.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate, b.name from event a, users b where a.user_no=b.no and a.store_no =${store_no}) c) where #{page_top}<=rn and rn<=#{page_bottom}

select * from(select c.*, rownum rn from(select a.no, a.title, to_char(a.startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate, to_char(a.enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as enddate, a.store_no, b.name from event a, users b where a.user_no=b.no) c where c.store_no=${store_no} and c.title like #{keyword}) where #{page_top}<=rn and rn<=#{page_bottom}

select * from( select c.*, rownum rn from( select a.no, a.content, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date, b.name from guestbook a, users b where a.user_no = b.no and a.store_no=${store_no}) c) where #{page_top}<=rn and rn<=#{page_bottom}

select * from( select d.*, rownum rn from( select * from( select a.no, a.content, to_char(a.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as reg_date, b.name from guestbook a, users b where a.user_no = b.no and a.store_no = ${store_no})c where c.content like #{keyword} or c.name like #{keyword}) d) where #{page_top}<=rn and rn<=#{page_bottom}
